alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 5:46AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lower Keys in Monroe County through 615 AM EDT... At 545 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boca Chica, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Big Coppitt Key, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Fleming Key, Key Haven, and Geiger Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 3 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
